import React, { Component } from 'react' import './SignUp.css' export default class signup extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props) this.state={ fname:"", email:"", phone:"", password:"" } this.handleSubmit=this.handleSubmit.bind(this); } handleSubmit(e){ e.preventDefault(); const{fname,email,phone,password}=this.state; console.log(fname,email,phone,password ); } render() { return (

Sign Up


this.setState({fname:e.target.value})} />


this.setState({email:e.target.value})}/>


this.setState({phone:e.target.value})}/>


this.setState({password:e.target.value})} />
) } }
